Package main

Class Book

java.lang.Object
main.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Borrowable, Returnable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Book extends Object implements Returnable, Cloneable, Serializable
This class represents Book. It has fields to store the information about the book and the methods for library functionality.
